name: PATRIOT STOLE
description:
This season we continued our journey by exploring a variety of Italian mills to produce these four unique stoles in 100% cotton. These items are exclusive items from our MADE IT ITALY collection for spring summer 2013.

This is perfect light weight accessory weaved loosely to give a very unique finish to the stole. 

Size: 16"x 70"

Made in Italy
100% Cotton

name: CANDY STOLE
description:
This season we continued our journey by exploring a variety of Italian mills to produce these four unique stoles in 100% cotton. These items are exclusive items from our MADE IT ITALY collection for spring summer 2013.

Finished in 6 stripes separated by a thin white line. All hand finished.

This is perfect light weight accessory weaved loosely to give a very unique finish to the stole. 

Size: 14.5"x 74

Made in Italy
100% Cotton

name: PLUM STOLE
description:
This season we continued our journey by exploring a variety of Italian mills to produce these four unique stoles in 100% cotton. These items are exclusive items from our MADE IT ITALY collection for spring summer 2013.

This is perfect light weight accessory weaved loosely to give a very unique finish to the stole.

name: JOURNEY STOLE
description:
This season we continued our journey by exploring a variety of Italian mills to produce these four unique stoles in 100% cotton. These items are exclusive items from our MADE IT ITALY collection for spring summer 2013.

This stole has been curated in the same colour as our logo which is the red stroke or marking. This logo encourages everyone to leave a mark where ever they travel or what ever they do. Leave your mark and continue your destination where ever that may be.

This is perfect light weight accessory weaved loosely to give a very unique finish to the stole. 

Size: 16"x 70"

Made in Italy
100% Cotton

name: MIDNIGHT SCARF
description:
Similar to the Storm Scarf for SS13, this item is in pure midnight black and super light and soft. This scarf has been dressed with a silk border which helps gives it the right amount of sheen.

This a limited item for the spring summer 2013 season. Each item is hand weaved using techniques which date back centuries using old machines. 

Size: 30" x 2.0 meters

100% Organic Cotton

name: ELM SCARF
description:
Taking on color from nature, this organic scarf has calming hues of green and earthy greys in a conventional weave.

This a limited item for the spring summer 2013 season. Each item is hand weaved using techniques which date back centuries using old machines. 

Size: 24"x 1.8 meters

100% Organic Cotton

name: STORM SCARF
description:
With this seasons vibrant selection, a few darker items were required to offset the collection to take the concept of day to night in one's attire. This scarf is weaved in Indigo & Black

This a limited item for the spring summer 2013 season. Each item is hand weaved using techniques which date back centuries using old machines. 

Size: 24"x 1.8 meters

100% Organic Cotton

name: RUDRA STOLE
description:
It is said that many of the Indian Gods in the Hindu culture had a blue tone in their skin. This stole takes on the form of Shiva's tone and hence has been named Rudra. The many names associated to the powerful idol. Weaved in a beautiful washed blue with pink highlights.

This a limited item for the spring summer 2013 season. Each item is hand weaved using techniques which date back centuries using old machines. 

Size: 24"x 1.8 meters

100% Organic Cotton

name: RANI STOLE
description:
A beautiful handwoven using organic cotton in a variety of hues which includes washed indigo and pink. This item has also been hand-stitched work in pink and gold.

This a limited item for the spring summer 2013 season. Each item is hand weaved using techniques which date back centuries using old machines. 

Size: 24"x 1.8 meters

100% Organic Cotton

name: MAHAYATRA SILK EMBROIDED TIE
description:
This season we present our embroided tie in two varieties. Celebrating the land and sea, we have out nautical theme with the blue dolphin and our majestic elephant in green and blue. 

In the Hindu religion "Ganesh" the elephant head God is known for good luck and wisdom. The same carries forward with the Dolphin being one of the smartest mammal in the sea. Both these creatures exemplifies beauty and wisdom.

Made in Italy
100% Silk
